text: @SecAzar @WhiteHouse @POTUS He figured he had to campaign on something right. He ran our Economy into the ground, he failed with Coronavirus & caused thousands to die. So it’s bringing a vaccine. Conveniently the timeline is after elections, when he has ur vote already! get rid of this moron & Vote Biden!
